front.title: MN Status Option for Proxy Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: IP flow mobility enables the ability of movement of selected flows from one access technology to another. This document extends the Proxy Mobile IPv6 signaling to convey mobile node's status information that can be used by the network to decide when and how perform flow mobility. It also defines options allowing the network getting information about different mobile node capabilities, which might be considered to decide how to tackle the node's mobility.
